meanings.sent1: After the long journey, he felt the groggiest he had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: She woke up feeling groggiest in the morning, struggling to focus.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked groggiest after chasing its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The groggiest squirrel in the park struggled to find its acorns.
meanings.sent5: The groggiest bee buzzed around aimlessly, bumping into flowers.

meanings.definition: Groggiest: characterized by a lack of alertness or energy
meanings.sent1: On Monday mornings, the office feels the groggiest.
meanings.sent2: The groggiest students in class struggled to keep their eyes open.
meanings.sent3: The groggiest sloth moved even slower than usual, if that was possible.
meanings.sent4: The groggiest computer in the office took ages to start up.
meanings.sent5: The groggiest turtle in the pond barely moved, blending in with the rocks.
